message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $92.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $82 for it.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $88.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $80 for it.
